com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities

Class FActivity_TabHost

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.content.Context
      • android.content.ContextWrapper
        • android.view.ContextThemeWrapper
          • android.app.Activity
            • android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
              • com.mk4droid.IMC_Activities.FActivity_TabHost
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.LayoutInflater.Factory, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, android.view.Window.Callback, android.widget.TabHost.OnTabChangeListener

    public class FActivity_TabHost
extends android.support.v4.app.FragmentActivity
implements android.widget.TabHost.OnTabChangeListener
    Tabs are hosted in this FragmentActivity. (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static android.widget.Button btSetup
      Button to overlay above Setup tab because PreferenceActivities are not supported as a fragment in Android 2.3
      static android.content.Context ctx
      This context is related to the whole application.
      static int IndexGroup
      Current active tab (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup)

      static android.support.v4.app.FragmentTabHost mTabHost
      The object that hosts all tabs
      static int RefrateAR
      Refresh rate in minutes for updating data (DEFAULT:5, Here READ-ONLY, can be modified by Activity_Setup)
      static android.content.res.Resources resources
      These resources are related mainly to the language of the GUI and they can be retrieved from the whole application for presenting localized messages (READ-only)

    • Field Detail

      • mTabHost

        public static android.support.v4.app.FragmentTabHost mTabHost
        The object that hosts all tabs

      • ctx

        public static android.content.Context ctx
        This context is related to the whole application. It is useful for presenting messages with Toast from everywhere in the application (READ-only).

      • resources

        public static android.content.res.Resources resources
        These resources are related mainly to the language of the GUI and they can be retrieved from the whole application for presenting localized messages (READ-only)

      • RefrateAR

        public static int RefrateAR
        Refresh rate in minutes for updating data (DEFAULT:5, Here READ-ONLY, can be modified by Activity_Setup)

      • IndexGroup

        public static int IndexGroup
        Current active tab (1=Main, 2=List, 3=New, 4=Filters, 5=Setup)

      • btSetup

        public static android.widget.Button btSetup
        Button to overlay above Setup tab because PreferenceActivities are not supported as a fragment in Android 2.3

      • metrics

        public static android.util.DisplayMetrics metrics
